Qichen Song HQI Postdoctoral Fellow, Harvard University
Research Publications CV Contact

Research

  • Frequency-domain, diffraction-based optical spectroscopy method capable of performing transport and calorimetry measurements on micron-sized, single-crystal caloric materials
    • Design and synthesis of barocaloric materials and devices with exceptional solid-state cooling performances using inorganic chemistry and heat transfer design principles
      • First-principles calculations to explore the chemical space for the optimal design of barocaloric materials at the molecular and atomic levels
